channel.title: Enter Log-In
channel.description: On my client, to log in you have to click 'Login'. But I want the client to have the option to press 'Enter' to login, or click 'Login' How can I do this?

item.title: Enter Log-In
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:2, topic:376562”]Client class

Search for this: aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, i1 + 73/i1/, anInt939, “Login”, l1 + 5, true);

And change Login to enter ;)[/quote]what that does is just changing the text on the button,
he wants: if u press enter on the keyboard u login

Read full topic
